creator: richard_yuqiang@hotmail.com
text:
Sometimes an unexpected space was got behind the data of some cells when using 
HSSF to read excel files which are created by Microsoft Excel2000(9.0.6926 SP-
3). No complex formats are used in the excel files. 

OS: Windows 2000 professional Japanese
POI Version: both poi-2.0-RC2-20040102.jar and poi-2.5.1-final-20040804.jar

Created attachment 13378
This is a sample excel file which the bug was found. Unexpected spaces will be found when get the values of [MARKET_CODE] column.
creator: richard_yuqiang@hotmail.com
jheight@apache.org
text:
CVS HEAD with the richtext support now corrects this issue.

Jason
